original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Cittasamuṭṭhānaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nanocittasamuṭṭhāno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
analyzed: citta samuṭṭhānam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na no citta samuṭṭhānaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi eva paccaya vasena
